ActorFrame.InitCommand: %function(self) xero.foreground = self assert(loadfile('template/sharedvars.lua'))() xero.ActorList = Def.ActorFrame { assert(loadfile('notitg/template.lua'))(), assert(loadfile('notitg/ease.lua'))(), assert(loadfile('notitg/plugins.lua'))(), assert(loadfile('lua/mods.lua'))(), } self:sleep(9e9) end
